definition: to transfuse blood/to give aid and support
to lose/to transport/to donate/to enter (a password)

sentences.english: Blood should be administered as indicated.
The causes of transfusion reaction was detected by antiglobulin test of Coombs.
sentences.chinese: 通过血型血清学检测来寻找输血反应原因。

sentences.english: It is not known when and by whom the idea of transfusing blood was developed.
sentences.chinese: 还不清楚是谁首先提出输血的概念。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the application of preoperative hemodilution autohemotransfusion in orthopedic operation.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨稀释式自体输血在骨科择期手术中的应用。

sentences.english: There are no rules about when to transfuse and who to do it to.
sentences.chinese: 从来没有相关规定，在什么时候什么人应该被输血。

sentences.english: Transfusion, some feared, gave science a means to engineer new animal-human hybrids.
sentences.chinese: 一些人认为，输血为科学提供生物杂交的可能。

sentences.english: But in the earliest battles for blood’s dominance, one thing is nonetheless certain…Medea would have been proud.
sentences.chinese: 唯一确定的是，输血最早战役中，美狄亚是骄傲的。

sentences.english: Seere bleeding often requires blood transfusion.
sentences.chinese: 严重出血往往需要输血。

sentences.english: Objective To know about the situation of HCV infection in haemodialysis patients before and after blood transfusion.
sentences.chinese: 目的了解血液透析患者输血前后HCV感染情况。

sentences.english: Fueling the Sith conquest was the Star Forge.
sentences.chinese: 为西斯征服者输血的就是“星际煅炉”。

sentences.english: The KCGMH-LTP performed the first living donor liver transplant without transfusion of blood or blood products in the world.
sentences.chinese: 高雄长庚医院完成全球首例未输血活体肝脏移植手术。

sentences.english: The case precipitates the French Parliament's ban on all transfusions involving humans.
sentences.chinese: 案件促使法国议会颁布所有涉及人类输血的禁令。

sentences.english: It's this clumping that makes blood transfusions so potentially dangerous.
sentences.chinese: 正是凝块现象使得输血疗法极具危险。

sentences.english: Despite Harvey's description 0f the circulatory system, there is no evidence that he considered blood transfusion.
sentences.chinese: 尽管哈威描述了循环系统，也不能证明他考虑到输血。

sentences.english: This is probably the first reported hemolytic transfusion reaction.
sentences.chinese: 这可能是第一次报道溶血性输血反应。

sentences.english: We ordered the blood for you. The kit's downstairs.
sentences.chinese: 血已经给你买好了，输血包也楼下。

definition: to make blood (function of bone marrow)
intravenous infusion/to get put on an IV
to take blood/to draw blood (e.g. for a test)
